name: PositionCommon
description: A library of helper functions for creating position and vector objects. Accessible from scripts via the global `PositionCommon` variable.

methods.name: createVec
methods.signature: createVec(x1: double, y1: double, z1?: double, x2: double, y2: double, z2?: double): Vec3D | Vec2D
methods.description: Creates a new 2D or 3D vector object representing the direction and magnitude from a starting point to an ending point.

methods.name: createLookingVector
methods.description: Creates a normalized `Vec3D` (a vector with a length of 1) that represents a direction of sight.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity whose direction of sight will be used.

methods.name: createLookingVector
methods.description: Creates a normalized `Vec3D` (a vector with a length of 1) that represents a direction of sight.

parameters.name: yaw
parameters.description: The horizontal rotation angle in degrees. Positive values rotate clockwise when looking from above (0° = positive Z direction, 90° = positive X direction, -90° = negative X direction).

parameters.name: pitch
parameters.description: The vertical rotation angle in degrees. Positive values look downward, negative values look upward (0° = horizontal, -90° = straight up, 90° = straight down).

methods.name: createPos
methods.signature: createPos(x: double, y: double, z?: double): Pos3D | Pos2D
methods.description: Creates a new 2D or 3D position object.

methods.name: createBlockPos
methods.signature: createBlockPos(x: int, y: int, z: int): BlockPosHelper
methods.description: Creates a new `BlockPosHelper` for the given integer coordinates.
